content: **free video tutorial** https //www youtube com/watch v=wyeavtgxnds&t=10s **free chart & pattern you can find here** https //thelagombox com/crochetpatterns/floral-sweater-crochet-pattern the flower sweater is the perfect lightweight layer for those lovely spring and summer days it s just right for breezy afternoons delightful boat outings or simply lounging by the beach this airy pullover is thoughtfully crafted by seaming together four cozy panels creating a relaxed long-sleeve boat-neck sweater that feels like a warm hug made from 100% cotton yarn it s soft breathable and incredibly versatile making it an adorable cover-up over your favorite swimsuit or a comfy throw-on for any sunny adventure the sleeves and body panels are lovingly stitched together and after a few wears you ll notice it gently stretches and becomes even more relaxed and drapey inviting you to wrap yourself in its comforting embrace **this pattern is a made to measure style** meaning it can be customized to any size using your own measurements and your preferred yarn **yarn** alize bella 1 393 yards 360 meters 3 6 ounces 100 gr per skein 100% cotton i used 2 skeins for my size s/m **crochet hook ** 4 0 mm g - or size to meet gauge 2 **supplies** embroidery needles 3 stitch markers 4 scissors 5 **skill level ** intermediate **gauge** 14 x 13 cm = one flower 25 sts and 9 row **pattern is worked in multiples of 25+2** **abbreviations** *written in u s crochet terms* **chain** -
